statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 9 \\ 0 \\ 9 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -13 \\ -2 \\ -11 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
